subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: If they were once adversaries, bound by Mike Woodson’s fleeting plan for a playing-time showdown, Iman Shumpert and J. R. Smith have become poster boys for the Knicks’ troubles.
snippet: If they were once adversaries, bound by Mike Woodson’s fleeting plan for a playing-time showdown, Iman Shumpert and J. R. Smith have become poster boys for the Knicks’ troubles.
